# UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode

**Enumeration**

Constants that determine how the system dismisses the keyboard when a drag begins in the scroll view.

## Declaration

```swift
enum KeyboardDismissMode
```

## Overview

You use these constants to set the value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScrollView/keyboardDismissMode-swift.property] property.

## Constants

- **UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode.none**: A mode in which a drag doesn’t dismiss the keyboard.
- **UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode.onDrag**: A mode in which the keyboard dismisses when a drag begins.
- **UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode.interactive**: A mode in which the keyboard follows the dragging touch offscreen, and can be pulled upward again to cancel the dismiss.
- **UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode.onDragWithAccessory**: A mode in which the keyboard and accessory view dismiss together when a drag begins.
- **UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode.interactiveWithAccessory**: A mode in which the keyboard and accessory view both follow the dragging touch offscreen, and can be pulled upward again to cancel the dismiss.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Dismissing the keyboard

- **keyboardDismissMode**: The manner in which the system dismisses the keyboard when a drag begins in the scroll view.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
